Player History
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 2/11/1966 to a 1-year deal worth $2,000,000 per year...
Drafted in 3rd round, 43rd overall pick, by Houston in 1968...
Traded from Houston to Pittsburgh on 7/31/1968 (Going to PIT: P N. Briles, P D. Lemonds. Going to HOU: RF R. Maris)...
Injured on 4/19/1972 with a Inflamed Bicep Tendon, out for 3 weeks...
Earned first career win on 4/27/1973...
Injured on 5/29/1977 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 2/6/1979 to a 3-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
Injured on 5/23/1980 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for 5-6 weeks...
Injured on 8/10/1981 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 4/3/1982 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
